General_Description: '''Sweet Tooth''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Craving something sweet? Once you get to the [[Temple of Demeter and Kore|Temple]] of [[Demeter]] and [[Persephone|Kore]] in [[Tegea]], head southwest to the fields in [[Pan]]'s [[Pan's Cradle|Cradle]]. I'll be stuck to a broken hive that's oozing with [[honey]]. Don't get stung!''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
